title: Prime Minister Liz Truss grilled by BBC local radio stations
content: This video can not be playedPrime Minister Liz Truss has defended the new government’s economic policies in a series of interviews with BBC local radio stations.Take a listen to some of the key moments from the prime minister’s first interviews since the mini-budget was announced last week.Listen to the full hour of back-to-back interviews on a special episode of Newscast here. <https://www.bbc.co.uk/sounds/play/p0d3flmh>
